jd:
Job Title: Senior Java Developer (Capital One Only)
Location: Hybrid (NYC, McLean/Richmond, VA, or Plano, TX) — Remote work is not an option, but relocation candidates are acceptable.
Visa: Any visa type accepted.
Contract Length: 4 months with possible extensions.

Requirements:
Must Have Skills:
- Python
- Java
- Angular (JavaScript)
- AWS

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with teams to support upcoming initiatives.
- Work with server-driven UI, managing content dynamically via backend systems.
- Lead serverless migration efforts (migrating Java-based apps from ECS to AWS Lambdas using Python).
- Participate in on-site work at one of the following locations:
  - NYC (Flatiron, 19th Street)
  - McLean, VA
  - Richmond, VA
  - Plano, TX

Important Submission Requirements:
- Capital One Former Employees Only – Non-formers will not be submitted.
- SSN and Date of Birth are required for submission.
